verses.text: ‘I he kuonga ko ia na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sione Papitaiso, ‘o malanga ‘i he toafa ‘o Siutea,
‘o ne pehē, Mou fakatomala, he kuo ofi ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e Langi.
He ko eni ia na‘e lea ki ai ‘e he palōfita ko ‘Aisea, ‘o pehē, Ko e le‘o ‘o ha toko taha ‘oku kalanga he toafa, Mou teuteu ‘a e hā‘ele‘anga ‘o Sihova; Fakatonutonu hono ngaahi hala.
Pea ko e kofu ‘o Sione ko ia na‘e ngaohi mei he fulufulu‘i kāmeli, pea fakama‘u leta ‘i hono kongaloto: pea ko ‘ene me‘akai ko e he‘e mo e honi ‘o e vao.
Pea na‘e toki ‘alu atu kiate ia ‘a Selusalema, mo Siutea kotoa, pea mo e feitu‘u kotoa ‘o Soatani:
pea nau papitaiso ‘iate ia ‘i he vaitafe ko Soatani, he vete ‘enau ngaahi angahala.

Pea ‘i he ene vakai ki he tokolahi ‘o e kau Fālesi mo e Sātusi ‘oku nau ha‘u ki he papitaiso, na‘a ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‘a e hako‘i ngata fekai, ko hai ne fale‘i kimoutolu ke hola mei he houhau ‘oku tu‘unuku mai?
Kapau ko ia, pea mou fua ‘o taau mo ha fakatomala.
Pea ‘oua te mou hanga ‘o fuataki ‘i homou loto, ‘o pehē, Ko ‘Epalahame ‘a ‘emau tamai: he ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku mafai ‘e he ‘Otua ke fokotu‘u mei he ngaahi maka ni ha fānau kia ‘Epalahame.
Pea ‘oku lolotonga tu‘u ni ‘a e toki ‘i he tefito ‘o e ngaahi ‘akau: ko ia ‘ilonga ha ‘akau ‘oku ‘ikai fua lelei, ‘oku tā ‘o laku ki he afi.

Ko au ‘oku ou papitaiso vai kimoutolu ki he fakatomala: ka ko ia ‘oku muimui mai ‘oku ne mālohi ‘iate au, ko e Toko Taha ia ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke takitaki hono topuva‘e: ‘e papitaiso kimoutolu ‘e ia ‘i he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni mo e afi.

Ko e Toko Taha ia ‘oku ‘i hono nima ‘a e ī, pea te ne tapili ke ‘osi ‘a ‘ene ‘au‘au‘anga: pea te ne tānaki ‘ene ngaahi fo‘i uite ki he feleoko, ka te ne tutu ‘a e kafukafu ‘aki ‘a e afi ‘oku ‘ikai matāmate‘i.
Pea toki ha‘u ‘a Sīsū mei Kāleli ki Soatani kia Sione ke papitaiso ‘iate ia.
Ka ka teke‘i ia ‘e Sione, ‘o ne pehē, Na‘e totonu mu‘a ke u papitaiso ‘iate koe, pea ‘oku ke ha‘u koā kiate au?
Pea tali ‘e Sīsū ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, Tukuange pē ‘i he taimi ni: he ‘oku taau pehē mo kitaua ke fakakakato ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni kotoa pē. Pea ne toki tukuange ia.

Pea kuo papitaiso ‘a Sīsū, na‘a ne ‘alu hake leva mei he vai; pea vakai, na‘e matangaki ‘a e langi kiate ia, pea ne mamata ki he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ‘alu hifo ‘i he tatau ‘o ha lupe, ‘o ne a‘u kiate ia
Pea ‘iloange, na‘e ai ha le‘o mei he langi na‘e pehē mai, Ko Hoku ‘Alo Pele ‘ena, ‘a ia kuo u hōifua ai.
